name: Huawei Y7 Prime
description: Huawei Y7 Prime (2019) 6.26'HD Dewdrop (3GB, 32GB ROM) Android 8.1 Oreo (13MP + 2MP) + 16MP Dual SIM 4G 4000mAh- Midnight Black
details: Huawei Y7 Prime (2019) smartphone was announced in January 2019. The phone comes with a 6.26-inch touchscreen display with a resolution of 720x1520 pixels and an aspect ratio of 19:9.  Huawei Y7 Prime (2019) is powered by an octa-core Qualcomm 450 processor. It comes with 3GB of RAM. The Huawei Y7 Prime (2019) runs Android 8 and is powered by a 4,000mAh battery. As far as the cameras are concerned, the Huawei Y7 Prime (2019) on the rear packs a 2 & 13-megapixel camera with an f/1.8 aperture. The rear camera setup has autofocus. It sports a 16-megapixel camera on the front for selfies. The Huawei Y7 Prime (2019) runs EMUI 8.2 based on Android 8 and packs 32GB of inbuilt storage that can be expanded via microSD card (up to 512GB). The Huawei Y7 Prime (2019) is a dual-SIM (GSM and GSM) smartphone
